game.name: Rainbow Macaroons Cooking
game.description:
Cooking games are preferred by almost all the girls. This new and interesting Rainbow Macaroons Cooking game is simple the one in which you have to get a chance to show your baking talents and time-management skills. Your goal in this free online game is to cook macaroons and get them prepared as delicious as possible. By just following a special macaroons recipe, you can get the job done and are ready to serve the meal for your friends and family. 

The beautifully-designed kitchen is full of all the possible ingredients and tools. Follow the instructions, use your mind and prepare the rainbow macaroons perfectly to show the world that you are also an expert chef. One of the best cooking games from the girls category, Rainbow Macaroons features awesome graphics, easy control and excellent gameplay. Make sure that you use the special tools, colors and sugar to prepare the delicious rainbow macaroons shortly.  

Try to use the special colors in proper quantity so that your dish will look amazing and give your friends and family a taste they always wanted. We are sure that once you play this cool flash game in your browser, you are sure to try this dish at your home on your own. Rainbow macaroons are a fantastic dish of the baking game. Decorating your item with different magic colors will surely give you an environment filled with unlimited fun and entertainment. Pay attention to the instructions and tools and make sure you will do a good job when it comes to preparing the macaroons in a way it should be.
